response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am prepared to consider offers. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, I believe we can come to an arrangement that is mutually beneficial. Considering its market value and your potential appreciation for it, I kindly propose a price of $950,000. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
